topic: Issues with Intune and the Windows Update for Business Deployment Service
subject: [patchmanagement] Issues with Intune and the Windows Update for Business Deployment Service
email_text_original:
You don't often get email from ameluso@whrhs.org. Learn why this is important
[https://aka.ms/LearnAboutSenderIdentification] 
Historically we have been using Intune to manage the availability of feature and
driver updates. This has worked well for feature updates for a few years now and
for driver updates for a few months. 
Around December we noticed that new drivers stopped populating in Intune for us
to approve. Then in mid January we began testing upgrading from Windows 11 22H2
to Windows 11 23H2. In the past once the feature update was in place, the device
would get it pretty fast, no more than a day or two. This time, nothing. Nothing
in the Intune reports as well. 
Fast forward through two tickets with Microsoft support, dozens of logs being
collected, creating and deleting feature and driver update policies and I
decided to take a peek into our tenant's Graph. There I found old driver
policies from December, which were already deleted from Intune weeks ago. Zero
feature update policies were listed, even though I have three active policies in
Intune. Basically, Intune has stopped communicating with Graph and the Windows
Update for Business Deployment Service. 
Last night, in Graph, I cleared out any old policies and created a new feature
update deployment and assigned a few devices to its deployment audience. I'm
going to let that sit for a few days and see if it works. There are still some
(old?) deployment audiences that Graph will not let me delete. 
FYI quality updates work and I still see data in my Windows Updates for Business
Azure workbook. 
Microsoft has not been helpful, stating they cannot check the health of our
tenant's Graph. 
Any Graph experts here who might know what the heck is going on with us? 
Take care, 
Anthony Meluso
Director of Technology
Watchung Hills Regional High School
108 Stirling Rd.
Warren, NJ 07059
908-647-4800 Ext. 4962 
--
Link: https://groups.google.com/d/msgid/patchmanagement/CAPEMYtHR2GL%3DxZFVJvArH5eE_qEKwxx7_3nBsYaLvchSiMS7Fg%40mail.gmail.com
evaluated_keywords: ['new driver stop populate', 'new feature update deployment', 'windows 11 23h2', 'windows 11 22h2']
evaluated_noun_chunks: ['the availability, feature and driver updates', 'feature and driver update policies', 'Windows Update for Business Deployment Service', 'the health of our tenant\'s Graph']
